docs.title: Home
Inject script

docs.text: If any items are locked on the first page, the user can navigate to the second page, on which items can be purchased.
docs.title: Version 1

docs.text: If any items are locked on the first page,  Save outfit  button becomes available. Saved outfits can be seen on the second page.
docs.title: Version 2

docs.text: No second screen is available, the user can only generate outfits and navigate to them from the first page.
docs.title: Version 3
